goals.title: Implement AI-Driven Sales Forecasting Model for HKPL
goals.description: By December 20, 2025, develop and implement an AI-driven sales forecasting model for the HKPL department that predicts monthly sales volume with at least 85% accuracy. This will involve collaborating with the data science team to select appropriate AI algorithms, cleaning and preparing historical sales data, training the model, and validating its performance. The model should integrate with existing sales data systems and provide actionable insights for sales planning and resource allocation, contributing to the manager's goal of company-wide AI adoption.
goals.companyTopBetAlignment: Transforming into an AI Company (This directly supports the company's AI transformation initiative by implementing an AI-driven solution within the HKPL department.)
goals.framework3E: ELEVATE (This goal aims to elevate existing sales forecasting processes by introducing AI, leading to improved accuracy and efficiency, which contributes to growth and scale.)
goals.coreValue: Simplify to Amplify (The AI model aims to simplify the sales forecasting process, freeing up resources and allowing the team to focus on other strategic initiatives.)

goals.title: Enhance QA Testing Process with AI-Powered Defect Prediction
goals.description: By September 30, 2025, integrate an AI-powered defect prediction tool into the HKPL QA testing process to proactively identify potential bugs and vulnerabilities. This includes researching and selecting a suitable AI tool, integrating it with the current testing environment, and training the QA team on its usage. The goal is to reduce the number of defects found in production by 15%, aligning with the manager's goal of deploying AI tools across departments and improving operational efficiency.
goals.kpi: Reduction in Production Defects (Target: 15% reduction compared to the previous year)
goals.companyTopBetAlignment: Transforming into an AI Company (This goal contributes to transforming the company into an AI company, specifically by applying AI to improve the quality assurance process.)
goals.framework3E: EXTEND (This goal extends the capabilities of the existing QA testing process by incorporating AI, increasing product penetration by ensuring higher quality and fewer defects.)
goals.coreValue: Shaping Tomorrow Today (Proactively identifying and preventing defects with AI ensures higher quality products and services, which contributes to the company's long-term success and future.)

goals.title: Develop AI-Based Anomaly Detection System for Sales Data
goals.description: By November 30, 2025, develop and implement an AI-based anomaly detection system to identify unusual patterns or outliers in HKPL sales data. This system will proactively flag potential issues such as fraudulent transactions, unexpected sales drops, or data entry errors. This includes defining anomaly detection rules, integrating the system with existing data sources, and establishing a process for investigating and resolving identified anomalies. The system should contribute to improved data integrity and faster issue resolution, supporting the manager's objective of deploying AI across departments for operational efficiency.
goals.kpi: Number of Anomalies Detected and Resolved (Target: Detect and resolve at least 90% of significant anomalies per month)
goals.companyTopBetAlignment: Transforming into an AI Company (This goal directly supports the company's AI transformation by implementing an AI-driven solution for anomaly detection in sales data.)
goals.framework3E: EXPAND (This goal expands the department's capabilities by adding a new, AI-driven function for identifying and addressing data anomalies, contributing to strategic organizational goals by ensuring data integrity and reducing potential risks.)
goals.coreValue: Do it a bit Earlier (By proactively identifying anomalies, the team can address potential issues before they escalate, exceeding expectations and preventing negative impacts on sales or customer experience.)
